page.title: 06WEETING STEAM RALLY
page.content: The great event of the year is the Steam Rally, usually held in mid-July over a Saturday and Sunday weekend. Farmland owned by a resident, Mr. Parrott is lent for the occasion and he also exhibits some of his own collection of steam traction engines. Many other exhibitors attend such as arts, crafts, charity stalls; there are demonstrations by timber firms, the local fire brigade and old methods of farming using contemporary equipment. Both exhibitors and spectators come from all over East Anglia for the weekend.
